contentrichtext.text: {{Expand Bulgarian|date=December 2009|Коритен (дем Илиджиево)}} '''Xirochori''' ({{lang-el|Ξηροχώρι}}, before 1926: Γιόρδινον - ''Giordinon'',<ref>[http://pandektis.ekt.gr/pandektis/handle/10442/170415 Name changes of settlements in Greece]</ref> {{lang-bg|Коритен}}) is a community and a village in the municipal unit of [[Agios Athanasios, Greece|Agios Athanasios]] in the [[Thessaloniki (regional unit)|Thessaloniki regional unit]], [[Greece]]. The community is 25 km north-northwest of downtown [[Thessaloniki]]. The community consists of two villages: Xirochori and Baleika. According to the 2001 census, it has a total population of 680 with the village of Xirochori having 647 of those and Baleika 33. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Chalkidona div}} {{coord|40.803|22.780|display=title}} {{CentralMacedonia-geo-stub}}
